roleset.name: to misdirect, foolhardy

example.name: never take a warlord's advice
example.text: Analysts believe some tribal warlords may have taken advantage of American firepower by accusing rival leaders of being Taliban and misguiding U.S. intelligence .

example.name: arg1
example.text: But for some reason it almost seems like the 35 year old man is some sort of predator whereas the 35 year old woman is only misguided .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Given these factors , state policymakers may be misguided in their assertion that districts financial woes are due to diseconomies of scale

propbank.arg: in their assertion that districts financial woes are due to diseconomies of scale

roleset.note: MISGUIDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'misguide' based on ebn instances. (from misguide.01-v predicate notes)
MISGUIDED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, misguide-v.01. (from misguided.01-j)
Arg3 from the verb not expected to apply here, as it appears to be a relic from the 'guide' frame. (from misguided.01-j)
